original_text: People from all the countries in the world will come together in front of me. I will put them into two groups. I will do it in the same way that a shepherd puts his sheep and goats into two groups.
korean_text: 모든 민족을 그 앞에 모으고 각각 구분하기를 목자가 양과 염소를 구분하는 것 같이 하여

sentences.original_text: People from all the countries in the world
will come together in front of me
I will put them into two groups
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 두 그룹으로 나눌 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will do it in the same way
that a shepherd puts his sheep and goats

sentences.korean_translation: 두 그룹으로 나누는 것과 같은 방식으로
